name: eTutorWorld Corporation
tag_list: online-tutoring, homework, education, live-online-tutoring, online-tutors, students, free-online-tutoring, homeschooling, math-tutor, science-tutor, online-math-tutor, science-online-tutor, teachers, math, science, learn-by-design, customized-tutoring
overview:
eTutorWorld.net â€“ is a newly launched online education service that provides live online tutoring in Math and Science for Grades 5 - 12 including AP courses and homework help.

eTutorWorld distinguishes itself from other online tutoring sites through the development of its unique Learning by Design methodology that focuses exclusively on the individual student. Tutors at eTutorWorld go beyond the subject matter and focus on the student. They are trained to identify and diagnose the needs or interests of each student and plan lessons accordingly. For each student the curriculum is customized as per their personal level of readiness and learning speed assuring success in the classroom or subject area.

Based on web 2.0 concepts and technology eTutorWorldâ€™s innovative tutoring service uses a combination of full voice communication, online chat and unique interactive whiteboard technology for live interaction between the tutor and the student, ensuring better interactivity and easy understanding of the concepts between the mentor and the students. It also helps replicate the classroom environment within the comfort and safety of the studentâ€™s home. The training sessions are scheduled at the studentâ€™s convenience and offers structured learning experiences to enhance the confidence of students in Math and Science. All sessions are recorded to enable play back anytime for easy revision or for parental review.
